threads.sub: Rainbow Dash is Too Much of a Tomboy
threads.com:
The idea that Sunset and Applejack are as masculine as Rainbow Dash is laughable. They are much more mellow and have much more feminine traits so that their friendships with the others still feels natural, they doesn't come off as the token tomboy like Rainbow Dash does.

Rainbow Dash has the personality of a typical loud male jock and yet she is friends with feminine girls who have completely different temperaments and interests than her. She has never been shown with tomboy or male friends that have her type of temperament. She comes off as a forced token tomboy character. Like really, they couldn't give her a single male friend? She has the masculine temperament of guys, so it seems like she would have definitely have male friends. Heck, she acts a lot more like your average male than your average female.

Where are her friends that are not vastly different from her? I'm not even necessarily asking for the same interests, just for a similar temperment. The rest of them are all chill normies in spite of varying interests while Rainbow is just alone as the loud brash hyper dude bro. And yet she magically is on the same footing as the rest as best friends, and appears to have no other close friends. If you had a jock friend who acted like Rainbow Dash but is a male, would you be able to see them as best friends with people with the mane six's temperment? Of course not.

In a real life setting like high school or college, what group of people could you more naturally see Rainbow Dash hanging out and bonding with: A group of brash, mascaline troublemakers (whether male or tomboys) who are athletic and enjoy screwing around, or the feminine safe mane six? You know the answer to this question deep down in spite of all the mental gymnastics you use to deny it. The Mane Six are too attitudinally safe and unfun for her. Her placement in the show is forced and has always been forced. But people don't care because they like tomboys. Which is fair enough, but you still gotta acknowledge this blatant flaw even if it does not personally bother you.

Sign ups close at 11:59pm CT on the 30th of November, no exceptions!

Nov the past: Gift assignments out. Card assignments out.

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>39365753
Nope. There are 3 methods of heat transfers: conduction ,convection, and radiation. Conduction and convection cannot occur without matter (which you'll find in short supply in the vacuum of space).so that really leaves only radiation. The sun radiates a ton a heat so the marmalade would actually be warm.

source: https://sitn.hms.harvard.edu/flash/2013/space-human-body/

threads.name: QM
threads.com:
>Space.... may be the final frontier, but it also sure as fuck is the most boring one
>It might have been something very special a millenia ago, back when the first pony left Equestria
>But as you drift through the endless void inside of your tin can you can't help but be bored beyond belief
>Out here you don't even get access to any of the station radios to take your mind off of the inky blackness
>And while you'd love to say that you could have just played some music you loaded onto your ship's board computer...
>The entire ship goes dark as if it knew what you were thinking about, the humming power core silencing itself
>You groan in annoyance and unbuckle yourself as you gently begin floating upwards in the lack of gravity
>Not that this piece of space junk has any gravity anyways, even with the reactor online
>Using one of your hooves to hold yourself to your captain's chair you align yourself carefully to the door at the back
>A gentle push propels you forward, carrying your lithe form through the cabin before seconds later you touch opposite end
>Taking holf of one of the many pipes moving along the wall you pull yourself to the airlock carefully and press the button next to it
>Frowning, you glare at the stubborn door and the fact that the emergency power decided to crap out on you as well
>In frustration you decide it is a great idea to kick the door, just to realize that every action has an equal reaction and in space there is nothing to stop you
>Going for a backwards tumble you flail your helpless hooves and even try flapping your wings to no avail
>No air and no gravity means your feathery (albeit covered by your flight suit) appendages are basically useless anyways
>Slamming head first into the console you attempt to rub your snout before remembering that, yeah, you have a helmet on and for good reason
>Sadly, while slamming onto your controls usually seems to work wonders, your little crash has done nothing but... broken off a small switch that now floats between your eyes
"Great, absolutely fucking amazing", you shout as you slam down a hoof on the console, immediately regretting it
>This time you were wise to hold yourself against one of the bars mounted to the console so you don't get thrown away, but now your hoof is hurting like a bitch
>Cursing, you turn back around and push yourself off again, much less graceful this time as your irritation gets the better of you
>Holding on to the wheel that serves as an override to the airlock's door, you begin to turn it with all the might that your quite frankly not exactly trained muscles can muster
>In absolute silence you struggle but eventually the probably rusted wheel begins to turn and the door slowly slides open
>Squeezing through the small gap you've managed to create you struggle a bit as your hindquarters decide to hinder your progress for just a few seconds

last_replies.name: QM
last_replies.com:
>>39365565
>Grabbing a pipe you pull and slip through, readjusting yourself in 0g to pull open the hatch in the floor that leads to your engine room
>Taking a glance at the contents of your cargo bay you frown at the scrap heap that is sitting there, tied down so it won't break something
>Being a satellite scrapper isn't exactly the exciting and rewarding adventure that you've hoped for when you finally got the chance to enter the pilot academy
>You still see the jumble of wires and electrical components inside spark on occasion, hoping it won't fry the data core
>That would turn this heap of metal into... nothing more than a mostly worthless heap of metal
>Something you can say is that you are most certainly not the best mare when it comes to metaphors
>It's a little surprising, but this thing seems to still have some juice in it, it's high voltage components inside having survived so long out here
>Heading down into the belly of the proverbial beast you turn on your suit mounted flashlight
>The room is completely dark and your first step is over to the Sparkle Drive
>From the looks of it, that part's fine, at least you can't find any obvious damage... apart from the burned control capacitors
>While it may sound bad, and if you are being honest to yourself it is as bad as it sounds, you learned how to deal with it
>Just a little bit of manual control and some additional, cheap sensors and you're able to keep the Sparkle Drive from overloading while charging it up
>A broken Sparkle controller is highly illegal, so what does a bit of modding of the ship matter?
>Quite a lot, actually, especially in the Pegasus Quadrant
>If any of security ship inspectors ever set hoof on this... you can't even call it a ship, you'd probably be out of transport
>Thankfully, it wouldn't be you on the line for that, considering your ship belongs to your stingy boss, Scrap Rat
>Well, mostly it wouldn't be your flank on the line but you are sure that you'd... never get to fly again if they found out
>But you've been flying this thing for about 3 years now and no pony but you has ever stepped hoof on here
>Well, while you were on it, at least, this ship cost the former pilot its life... and the pilot before that... and the one before

I had to make a thread about this, to both cope alongside other people who have played it, and spread awareness about how rediculous this game can be. This shit really takes the cake.

>One of the games beginner player deals is "Pay 8 dollars for Spike"
>The in game currency, gems, are rediculously overpriced. $2 for 20 gems, that's not so bad right? Ponies average around 500/600 gems. With some background ponies or creatures going for multiple thousands.

THE ADS
>I have probably watched thousands and thousands of 30 second ads from this game. You want to level up your pony? Either pay an absolutely extortionate amount of money or watch a 30 second ad 5 times for each pony or creature you want at 5 stars.
>You want to play the minigames that you need to do for quests, or event rewards? Well get ready to watch a 30 second ad to play the Minecart game, then watch your other 30 second ad to get an extra life! (I have done this more than 20 times in one day)
>You want to take an hour off of the incredibly long Group Quests which last 48 hours or more? watch your 30 second ad.
There are so, so many examples of this that I can't list them all. But this next one takes the cake.

One of the games Quests! "Rewarding is Fun":
>Watch 81 ads and you can get a background pony!
>81 30 second ads...
>I was working my way through this "Quest", you can only watch 5 ads every day on this specific thing. I expected that it would just change what background pony I was granted after the deadline is over, and I'd "only" have 8 more ads until it's mine.
>No. Time to watch 81 ads again.

threads.com:
What, you didn't think Into the Blue was the only CYOA I was running, did you?


>who's this faggot again?
I'm a QM that used to have a lot more spare time. Then 2020 happened and my life went to Hell, so I decided to put this CYOA on hold for awhile. It's been that way for a LOT longer than I ever intended for it to. I'm sorry for that; I'm sure most of you who played this back in its heyday (~2019 or so) are long gone... But that's alright. That's how life goes sometimes. There's no sense crying about the past, so let's move on. I'm back, and I'd like to continue this CYOA, with whoever's left and whoever is yet to come. So, if you'd like to play, come on in!

>okay faggot so how does THIS game work?
Unlike Into the Blue, this game is a lot more story-focused. You play as a unicorn colt named Tough Cookie, a comic and action show fan who's getting the chance of a lifetime: to be a REAL superhero. It's up to you to guide him in his quest to protect his friends and family, his hometown, and his world.

While the title implies that it is Fluttershy trying to rape Anon, others may follow in her stead and attempt their own versions of rape. There are different versions of Flutterrape, but most are light-hearted comedies about the ponies failing in their attempts to get into Anon’s pants. Just because your story has Anon in it, doesn't mean it fits in this thread. Check other threads (AiE, RGRE etc) about story content before posting.

>It's been 10 years, how is this thread still alive?
A perverse mixture of necromancy and spite.

>How do I start writing?
Use your imagination, you nitwit. Additionally, brush up on your grammar and abandon your standards.

Writing Guides:
Clever Dick's Tips For Short Stories -- https://ponepaste.org/1274
Driverbang's Writing Guide -- https://ponepaste.org/1275
Navarone's Writing Rules -- https://ponepaste.org/1276

For additional information, lurk. You could also check out the T:EM/P/O threads for further writing advice, unless it's dead.
So many threads have died, but only Flutterrape has remained. We shall always remain. We are bound to the fate of the board as a lich is bound to its phylactery.

Welcome to the Pony Voice Preservation Project!
youtu.be/730zGRwbQuE

The Pony Preservation Project is a collaborative effort by /mlp/ to build and curate pony datasets for as many applications in AI as possible.

Technology has progressed such that a trained neural network can generate convincing voice clips, drawings and text for any person or character using existing audio recordings, artwork and fanfics as a reference. As you can surely imagine, AI pony voices, drawings and text have endless applications for pony content creation.

AI is incredibly versatile, basically anything that can be boiled down to a simple dataset can be used for training to create more of it. AI-generated images, fanfics, wAIfu chatbots and even animation are possible, and are being worked on here.

Any anon is free to join, and there are many active tasks that would suit any level of technical expertise. If you’re interested in helping out, take a look at the quick start guide linked below and ask in the thread for any further detail you need.

Howdy, partner!

What you see here began as a series of comedy-centric stories with the concept of an alicorn-ascended Princess Applejack trying to change a mismanaged Equestria for the better by humorously interacting with the other, quite lazy, princesses. Plus late night pink antics.

Not to mention a whole bunch of Changelings with nothing better to do but cause mischief.


The whole thing was set in motion by this gem:

~~~~~

>So, wait, why am Ah' a princess again?

>Because you seem to be the only goddamn one of those ponies who gets that a Princess need to do actual work regarding maintenance of the kingdom. You know how much city planning or trade negotiations Twilight or Luna have done? Fucking nothing. Everyone is obsessed with the world ending threats they think I should fight, but the minute I point out the free health care I have to work to maintain everyone goes quiet. And don't even get me started on Cadence, who can't even manage a basic meeting with the Equestrian Games representative. Fucking annoying. Go do actual princess stuff, because apparently everyone else got the pamphlets mixed up or something and thinks "Princess" means "Beat cop."

~~~~~

Are you feeling creative? Try your hand at writing a story! No contribution is too small and we love having new folks around.

If you're more artistically inclined give a drawing or sketch a shot. Don't fret too much; it doesn't have to be fancy and we appreciate artwork a lot.

If that isn't your style either, writers always need feedback. So tell us what you liked - and what you didn't - to help us improve.

If you are unsure about anything, do not be afraid to ask. We will gladly bring you up-to-date or explain anything you feel is unclear.

My Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@deletedmlpvideos/

Welcome to my archive project! Here I will reupload a variety of deleted videos related to My Little Pony and the Brony fandom.
Youtubers I will reupload videos from include Wubcake, Saberspark, Digibro, BronyVids, EmuEmi, PaleoSteno, Tommy Oliver, ToonKritic2YK, JHaller, and others!

I have recently finished uploading videos from Wubcake's old channel. It featured a variety of creative content mainly related to My Little Pony and Equestria Girls. Videos include comic dubs, fanfic readings, animatics, song covers/parodies, fun Skype calls with voice actors messing around, and a bunch of dubs and parodies. The only videos of hers I did not upload were her NSFW fanfic readings (don't want to risk community guideline strikes), but those all can be found here: https://odysee.com/$/playlist/9afca968d751e62b80b628d925c5175a80c94eb2

Later today I will start uploading other content. I will be uploading miscellaneous content for the next few days or so (about 50 videos), then I'll upload BronyVids' stuff (about 100 videos), then I'll get to Saberspark, PaleoSteno, and the Everfree Network Podcasts! After that I'll probably upload Digibrony and BronyCurious.


If you want information on the content I am re-uploading, check the below link out for full descriptions of the content:
https://www.reddit.com/r/mylittlepony/comments/z3zfh5/deleted_mlp_videospodcasts_archive_saberspark/

And if you want a full list of the videos I am currently planning on re-uploading and links to the archives of them, check out the below link:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1x0eqWNPu7c3rxCAQ-s6zT-_N_r3nrx5HaNxPdG7DQAg/edit

Thanks to the people at Pony Archive and Archive.org for preserving all of these videos, I found the vast majority of these videos from those two places. Without those people, all of this content would be long lost.

If you have any recommendation for videos you want me to find archives of, or have access to any missing videos from these channels not included in my spreadsheet, please let me know!
